document_data.name: Embro Albrath
document_data.mainbody: '''Embro Albrath''' was the head of the mercantile [[House Albrath]], as well as their [[Merchants Council|council]] representative, during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was known for his ruthless determination in business and pompous attitude. By the year [[1370 DR|1370]] he had fathered 16 daughters.
document_data.Description: Councilman Albrath was a stout man with a distinct mustache. He also possessed an ostentatious sense of fashion, as evidenced by the many [[gold]] chains and large rings he wore.
